CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - LEGISLATION
This is a chronological listing of the ordinances and resolutions of the City of Whitesburg, Georgia, used in this Code. Repealed or superseded laws at the time of the Recodification and any omitted materials are not reflected in the table.
EXPAND

this Code
